description: Numbers that are congruent to {0, 2, 3, 5, 7, 8, 10} mod 12. The ivory keys on a piano.
comments: More precisely, the key-numbers of the pitches of a minor scale on a standard chromatic keyboard, with root = 0 and flat seventh.Also key-numbers of the pitches of an Aeolian mode scale on a standard chromatic keyboard, with root = 0. An Aeolian mode scale can, for example, be played on consecutive white keys of a standard keyboard, starting on the root tone A.
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,0,0,0,0,0,1,-1).
crossrefs: Complement of A060106. A piano sequence since if a(n)<88 then A059620(a(n))=0.
